about_the_game:
In a wonderful world obsessed with frogs, and a quaint little island chock full of them, Bonnie Bear struggles with low self-worth and doesn’t have a single frog of their own. When Bonnie’s friends band together to surprise the bear with a toadbag for their birthday, though, it sets off an unexpected and wonderfully wild adventure to save the archipelago, level up Bonnie’s self-worth, and collect a bunch of frogs so you can compete in the most exciting pastime on the island - Frogtime!



On this island, everything is settled through a strategic and tactical game of Frogtime - deploy a variety of frog species and maneuver, leapfrog, and hop them across the field to outscore your opponents and come out on top!



Plus - buy booster eggs, trade toads, win some wart-covered companions and collect so many frogs. Probably too many, honestly. You can even give them hats! There are plenty of different strategies and tactics you can use to come out on top - what kind of frog-dueler are you? 



Bonnie Bear Saves Frogtime is full of diverse characters, silly voice acting, and whimsical music hand-crafted for the game. Every piece of audio you hear feels like you’re experiencing it as it’s being made - songs and dialogue are full of first-takes and funny imperfections that add to the charm of this frog-fueled adventure.



Embark on an unforgettable escapade with Bonnie Bear, where laughter, self-discovery, and the joyful embrace of amphibian companionship await at every turn. Get ready to save the world and find your self-worth in the most ribbiting way possible!
detailed_description:
Features

  • A froggy-feeling bear: Step into the paws of Bonnie Bear as they bond with friends, rediscover their self-worth, and have a hilarious and heartfelt island adventure.

  • It’s time to f-f-f-f-f-f-f-frog!: Win, trade, buy, and collect over 40 different kinds of frogs to craft your perfect frog deck - then challenge your island neighbors to some Frogtime and see who hops out on top.

  • Rank up, gear up, and feel good!: Level up to grab frog-filled booster eggs, buy funky frog hats, compete with stronger Frogtime players, and raise Bonnie’s self-worth!

  • Hand-crafted sounds and tunes: Experience a heartwarming soundtrack and hilarious voice-acting full of improvisations, first-takes, and endearing imperfections.


About the Demo

In a wonderful world obsessed with frogs, and a quaint little island chock full of them, Bonnie Bear struggles with low self-worth and doesn’t have a single frog of their own. When Bonnie’s friends band together to surprise the bear with a toadbag for their birthday, though, it sets off an unexpected and wonderfully wild adventure to save the archipelago, level up Bonnie’s self-worth, and collect a bunch of frogs so you can compete in the most exciting pastime on the island - Frogtime!



On this island, everything is settled through a strategic and tactical game of Frogtime - deploy a variety of frog species and maneuver, leapfrog, and hop them across the field to outscore your opponents and come out on top!



Plus - buy booster eggs, trade toads, win some wart-covered companions and collect so many frogs. Probably too many, honestly. You can even give them hats! There are plenty of different strategies and tactics you can use to come out on top - what kind of frog-dueler are you? 



Bonnie Bear Saves Frogtime is full of diverse characters, silly voice acting, and whimsical music hand-crafted for the game. Every piece of audio you hear feels like you’re experiencing it as it’s being made - songs and dialogue are full of first-takes and funny imperfections that add to the charm of this frog-fueled adventure.



Embark on an unforgettable escapade with Bonnie Bear, where laughter, self-discovery, and the joyful embrace of amphibian companionship await at every turn. Get ready to save the world and find your self-worth in the most ribbiting way possible!

name: Bonnie Bear Saves Frogtime Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520 or Higher / AMD Radeon R3 or Higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

short_description: Bonnie’s self-worth is at an all-time low, and there’s only one thing that can fix it - a lovely game of Frogtime! Grab your toadbag and get ready to go on a hilarious adventure full of quirky characters, explorable islands, and way too many frogs.
